tooltip: Select Blind as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Blind focuses on improving hiding his units for ambushes.
Allows you to summon Blind, an swift Melee hero with Camouflage.
Small multiheaded undead creature that can attack multiple targets at once.
Stalhounds and Stalhorses now deal Poison damage.
Stalkin, Stalhounds, and Staltroops gain the ability to burrow and become Stealthed.
